'''Kiminami Anna's Invigorating Kitty Meal''' is a Quest Item obtained alongside the recipe for [[Invigorating Kitty Meal]] during the "[[Neko Is a Cat: Shrine Recipe]]" [[World Quest]]. The dish was cooked by [[Kiminami Anna]] for the [[Traveler]] to give to [[Neko]].
